ComicInfo.Title: The Awesome Answer!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Awesome Answer!: Galactus tells Thor the story of his origin. Odin then appears and transports Thor to Earth. A new menace had emerged and is terrorising mankind. It seems that only Thor stands a chance of defeating The Thermal Man.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:38:45. [Issue ID 23048]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
